rows.label: qst103318_msg0001
rows.name: Everyone, are you alright?!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0002
rows.name: Y-you... Are you Elnos?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0003
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0004
rows.name: ...Dad!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0005
rows.name: Why are you an Imperial soldier?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0006
rows.name:
Why...? Dad, why are you
doing something like this?!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0007
rows.name:
It's obvious... For revenge!
Can you forgive them?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0008
rows.name:
The Empire that didn't save your
mother! The ones who only exploit us!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0009
rows.name:
I can't forgive them...
but we had to live.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0010
rows.name:
That's why I risked everything
to be scouted and became
an Imperial Driver!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0011
rows.name:
Do you have any idea how
hard it was after you left?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0012
rows.name:
Didn't I just tell you? For
revenge against the Empire...

rows.label: qst103318_msg0013
rows.name:
An innocent person was killed!
That person had a family too!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0014
rows.name:
What kind of revenge is it to
create more children like us?!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0015
rows.name:
Mom wouldn't want you to
seek revenge either!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0016
rows.name: I'm doing the same thing... I see...

rows.label: qst103318_msg0017
rows.name: Are your siblings well?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0018
rows.name:
They're living well on the
money I earn from the
Empire... Why do you ask?

rows.label: qst103318_msg0019
rows.name:
If I'm forgiven... I want
to go back to Torigoth and
take care of my siblings.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0020
rows.name:
...I can't decide what
to do with you, Dad.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0021
rows.name: Please...

rows.label: qst103318_msg0051
rows.name: (What should we do?)

rows.label: qst103318_msg0052
rows.name: Hand him over to the military.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0053
rows.name: Banish him from Superbia.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0054
rows.name: Let him do as he pleases.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0101
rows.name: I understand. I will comply...

rows.label: qst103318_msg0102
rows.name:
You have to tell the military
everything you know, Dad.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0103
rows.name:
It's an organization of those who
hold a grudge against the Empire.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0104
rows.name:
I'm just a low-level
combatant, so I don't know
much about the higher-ups.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0105
rows.name: I'm sorry I can't be of more help.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0106
rows.name:
I will take responsibility for
my father and bring him in!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0107
rows.name: Thank you for all your help.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0108
rows.name:
Here, this is a token of
my thanks! Well then...

rows.label: qst103318_msg0201
rows.name:
Banishment... In that case,
send me to Torigoth.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0202
rows.name:
I'll work hard and take
care of my siblings.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0203
rows.name: Dad...!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0204
rows.name:
That's right, tell us about the
culprit who caused this incident.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0205
rows.name:
It's an organization of those
with anti-imperial sentiments...

rows.label: qst103318_msg0206
rows.name:
I'm just a low-level combatant,
so I don't know much about the
higher-ups. I'm sorry.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0207
rows.name: Then I'll escort you to the port.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0208
rows.name: Thank you for all your help.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0209
rows.name:
Here's a token of my
thanks! Well then...

rows.label: qst103318_msg0301
rows.name:
As I please... Yes,
I'll do as I please.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0302
rows.name:
I'll go back to Torigoth, work
hard... and live with my siblings.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0303
rows.name: Dad...!

rows.label: qst103318_msg0304
rows.name:
That's right, tell us about the
culprit who caused this incident.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0305
rows.name:
It's an organization of those
with anti-imperial sentiments...

rows.label: qst103318_msg0306
rows.name:
I'm just a low-level combatant,
so I don't know much about the
higher-ups. I'm sorry.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0307
rows.name:
Then I'll leave the capital
and head to Torigoth.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0308
rows.name:
I understand. Be careful... When
I have time, I'll come see you.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0309
rows.name: Thank you for all your help.

rows.label: qst103318_msg0310
rows.name:
Here's a token of my
thanks! Well then...
